Package renderer.scene.util

Interface MeshMaker_TP

All Superinterfaces:
MeshMaker
All Known Implementing Classes:
Cone, ConeFrustum, ConeSector, Cylinder, CylinderSector, Disk, DiskSector, ParametricSurface, Pyramid, PyramidFrustum, Ring, RingSector, Sphere, SphereSector, SquareGrid, SurfaceOfRevolution, Torus, TorusSector, TriangularPyramid
public interface MeshMaker_TP extends MeshMaker
A Model that implements MeshMaker_TP can build its geometric mesh in any of three structures: using horizontal triangle strips, vertical triangle strips, or individual quads (each made up out of a two triangle strip).

    • remake

      default Model remake(int n, int k)
      Build an instance of the Model with new values for the number of lines of latitude and longitude while keeping all the other model parameters the same.
      Specified by:
      remake in interface MeshMaker
      Parameters:
      n - number of lines of latitude for the returned Model
      k - number of lines of longitude for the returned Model
      Returns:
      a new instance of the Model with the updated parameters

    • remake

      Model remake(int n, int k, MeshType type)
      Build an instance of the Model with new values for the number of lines of latitude and longitude while keeping all the other model parameters the same.
      Parameters:
      n - number of lines of latitude for the returned Model
      k - number of lines of longitude for the returned Model
      type - the MeshType that the returned Model should contain
      Returns:
      a new instance of the Model with the updated parameters and MeshType
